name: ShamiList
description:
A style for AniList which has options to change many aspects of the site.

Current options:
Navbar from the side to the top and made smaller.
Widened many aspects of the site to better utilise screen space.
Semi-transparent like/reply counters in order to see partially hidden statuses.
additional_info: Thanks to Kuwabara for advice and providing the base for the navbar move and Kazakuri for advice! Also fully compatible with this awesome style https://userstyles.org/styles/119215 (don't move the navbar using that style if using this ones) Forum thread for if you find any bugs or have any suggestions & feedback: http://anilist.co/forum/thread/2015 10/04/17 ver 4.1 - fixed the location of the new donator badge when using top navbar 07/03/17 ver 4.0 - added an option to make the like/reply counters on statuses semi-transparent so messages aren't sometimes partially hidden 26/01/17 ver 3.6 - minor bug fix (location of new changelog thingy) 22/01/17 ver 3.5 - minor bug fix (lists page anchor links) 05/12/16 ver 3.4 - minor bug fix (some css stuff was renamed, addressed this change) 19/11/16 ver 3.3 - minor bug fix (list theme editor save and close buttons) 29/10/16 ver 3.2 - minor bug fix (spacing between statuses) 24/10/16 ver 3.1 - minor bug fix (status widths were breaking on rare occasions) 01/10/16 ver 3.0 - added an extra width option to make statuses wider than normal, but not super duper wide 25/09/16 ver 2.0 - made width an option instead of being mandatory 15/09/16 ver 1.1 - minor bug fix (loading bar with navTop) 13/09/16 ver 1.0 - tentative release
